The sink function to pass to setGlobalLoggerConfig.
Captures log entries into the internal array.

## Import

```ts
import { InMemorySink } from "@alchemy/common";
```

## Parameters

### entry

`LogEntry`

- The log entry to capture

## Returns

`void`
